All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adapter
 
Advance
The Advance class is a type of an Order issued by a Player.
AggresivePlayerStrategy
This class creates orders for the AggressivePlayer according to its strategy.
Airlift
Airlift class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
BenevolentPlayerStrategy
This class implements the Strategy for the benevolent type of player.
Blockade
The Blockade class represents a blockade order in the game.
Bomb
Bomb class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
CheaterPlayerStrategy
This Strategy class belongs to the Cheater Player.
CommandPrompt
This class is the View part of the MVC architecture.
ConquestLoader
 
Continent
This Class is for all the Continents of the Map
Country
This is a class for all the countries/territories.
Deploy
Deploy class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
Edit
The Edit Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
ExecuteOrder
The ExecuteOrder Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
GameEngine
This is the main controller class of MVC model.
GameModel
This is the GameModel class of MVC model.
GameOver
The GameOver Phase extends the Phase class and implements methods specific to this phase.
GameSaved
The GameSaved Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
HumanPlayerStrategy
This Strategy class belongs to the Human Player.
IssueOrder
The IssueOrder phase extends the Phase class and implements methods specific to this phase.
LogEntryBuffer
Class which extends the Observable class.
Logger
This is a concrete class which implements observer interface.
Map
This is the model class for the Map used in the game.
MapController
This class update the MapModel.
MapLoader
 
Negotiate
Negotiate class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
Observable
Observable class which has methods to connect/disconnect with observers and notifies if there is any update.
Observer
Interface observer which has one update method which is called when observable notifies it.
Order
Parent interface which is implemented by different Orders in the game.
Phase
Represents an abstract class for game phases, each phase extending this class represents different game states.
Player
The Player class represents the actual player participating in the game.
PlayerController
The Player Controller class controls the activities of all the players at once.
RandomPlayerStrategy
This Strategy class belongs to the Random Player.
Reinforcement
The Reinforcement Phase extends the Phase class and implements methods specific to this phase.
StartGame
Driver class for the game.
Startup
The Startup Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
Strategy
This is a parent class for the strategy pattern.
ValidateMap
This class checks the validity of the map by converting into a graph object.
